nodes.id: 中国共产党宁远县委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省永州市宁远县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Ningyuan County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共宁远县委书记、永州市副市长，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee and Vice Mayor of Yongzhou. He was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The discipline inspection organ of the Communist Party of China in Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省的地方国家监察机关。
description.en: The local state supervisory organ of Hunan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党纪律处分，指开除党籍、开除公职。
description.en: A disciplinary action by the Communist Party of China, referring to expulsion from the Party and removal from public office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共宁远县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共宁远县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共宁远县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共宁远县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician currently serving as the Secretary of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

en: Constitution of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本法规。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁远县代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县委员会的上级机构。
description.en: The superior body of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁远县委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The standing body of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁远县纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县委员会的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The discipline inspection organ of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

description.zh-cn: 宁远县的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Ningyuan County.

relationships.source: 中国共产党宁远县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县委员会是党在宁远县的领导机关。
description.en: The CCP Ningyuan County Committee is the leading party organ in Ningyuan County.

relationships.source: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 对涉嫌严重违纪违法的刘卫华进行纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: Conducted a disciplinary review and supervisory investigation into Liu Weihua for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 对涉嫌严重违纪违法的刘卫华进行纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: Conducted a disciplinary review and supervisory investigation into Liu Weihua for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 刘卫华遭到开除党籍和开除公职（双开）处分。
description.en: Liu Weihua was subjected to 'shuangkai' (expulsion from the Party and removal from public office).

relationships.target: 中国共产党宁远县委员会

中国共产党宁远县委员会
中国共产党宁远县委员会
中国共产党宁远县委员会
中国共产党宁远县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党章程是中国共产党宁远县委员会的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the Communist Party of China is the legal source of authority for the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党宁远县委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党宁远县代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县代表大会是中国共产党宁远县委员会的上级机构。
description.en: The CCP Ningyuan County Congress is the superior body of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党宁远县委员会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党宁远县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县委员会常务委员会是中国共产党宁远县委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee is the permanent body of the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党宁远县纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党宁远县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁远县纪律检查委员会是中国共产党宁远县委员会的本级纪律检查机关。
description.en: The CCP Ningyuan County Commission for Discipline Inspection is the discipline inspection organ at the same level as the CCP Ningyuan County Committee.
